my-description: Software engineer, specialized in web development. I dedicate my available time to learn and practice different programming languages and web technologies, both front-end and back-end. I consider myself a proactive person, with teamwork skills and a great ability to adapt to changes. I am excited to continue my education in the web development field and I am confident that I can contribute my skills and knowledge to any project I can be involved in. My other hobbies are playing video games, watching soccer, spending time with family, and seeing new places.
